full_summary:
### Aircraft Fire Detection and Suppression Trainer
#### [Government Tender Announcement]
#### Solicitation Number: WS3694383568
#### Publication Date: October 13, 2022
#### Tender Closing Date: November 14, 2022 (14:00 Eastern Standard Time)
#### Amendment Date: November 7, 2022

#### Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking a Training System in Detection and Extinction of Aircraft Fires from qualified bidders. The successful bidder will be responsible for demonstrating the theory of aircraft fire suppression, warning, and indication.

#### Mandatory Technical Criteria
Bidders must clearly demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criteria. Failure to comply will result in the offer being deemed non-responsive.

#### Bid Submission Guidelines
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by November 14, 2022, at 14:00 EST. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Key Details
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Contact: Christopher Harvey | (519) 671-2396 | christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14355483?extsite=MTQzNTU0ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14355483?extsite=MTQzNTU0ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Work Location
The Training System will be used at 16 Wing Borden CFSATE.

#### Expected Contract Start Date: November 30, 2022
#### Expected Contract End Date: Not specified

#### Contracting Status
This tender is now closed.

#### Trade Agreements
This contract will be subject to the terms of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
